CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Covered_Pests__c), NULL, SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, "Roaches"), "Roaches; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, "Mice"), "Mice; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, "Rats"), "Rats; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, "Non Wood Boring Ants"), "Non Wood Boring Ants; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Covered_Pests__c, "Other"), Covered_Pests_Other__c, NULL) + ".", "; .", NULL))
CustomField.label: Covered Pests Summary
